title: isaiyAl eduvum
sahitya:
isaiyAl eduvum vasiyam Agum iduvE isayin atishayam Agum


anupallavi

  pasikk-amudAgum piNi pokkum nal isai amuduNDAl inbam uNDAgum


caraNam    idaiyat-tAmarai idazh virittADum nIngal iduvarai kANAda pudumaigal kUDum
matiyai mayakkiDum madhurasa nAdam mudaliDam peruvadu muttamizh gItam
